hints.text: I'm round and orange, with a spooky face. Find me where you carve and place!
Witches fly and black cats prowl, look for your clue where you hear an owl!
Ghosts go boo and goblins play, your next hint is where you rest each day!
Candy corn and chocolate bars, check the place you keep your jars!
Bats at night take to the sky, your next clue is where clothes dry!
Spiders spin webs, witches stir brew, look for your hint in a stinky shoe!
Skeletons dance and mummies creep, your next clue is where you sleep!
Jack-o'-lanterns glow with light, check the place that's out of sight!
Monsters mash and zombies moan, your next hint is by the phone!

congratsMessage: You've completed the PC Kids 2025 Halloween Scavenger Hunt.
prizeInstructions: Please pick up your gift bag.
